title: Headstone
description:
A headstone or tombstone, used to mark graves. Appearance varies from platform to platform, with different shapes and inscriptions.

Used to talk about death — literally, metaphorically, and metaphysically.

Often paired with other death-related emoji like ‚ö∞Ô∏è Coffin and ‚ò†Ô∏è Skull and Crossbones.
apple_vendor_description: Apple‚Äôs headstone emoji is presented with a somber, respectful reverence, featuring a clean, upright stone with a gently rounded top. Realistic lighting and soft gradients on Apple devices lend it a dignified, almost weathered appearance, evoking feelings of remembrance and reflection. This emoji is often used to acknowledge loss, pay tribute to someone who has passed, or mark a significant, often final, event.
